import math
t = int(raw_input())
while t>0:
	s = raw_input()
	array = []
	for i in range(123):
		array.append(0)
	for i in s:
		array[ord(i)] += 1
	price = 0
	for i in range(65,91):
		price += math.ceil(array[i]/2.0)
	for i in range(97,123):
		price += math.ceil(array[i]/2.0)
	print int(price)
	t -= 1
